subject: Re: JUnit 4.5 beta 3
msgSnippet: Did anyone give it a try?  Thanks, David Saff
messageBody:
Did anyone give it a try? Thanks,

David Saff

On Tue, Jul 22, 2008 at 4:38 PM, David Saff <david@...> wrote:
> And on we iterate...
>
> We've published a few more initially-internal classes, fixed a few
> more bugs, and generally cleaned up:
>
> http://sourceforge.net/project/showfiles.php?group_id=15278&package_id=226053&release_id=615067
>
> Again, the changes are likely to only affect projects that extend
> JUnit functionality with custom runners. As a matter of fact, it
> probably breaks anyone who tried beta 2, because we've moved
> BlockJUnit4Runner from internal packages to published packages.
>
> Please try to substitute in the new build. If no bugs are found, it's
> on to documentation, and final release!
>
> David Saff
>
> P.S. And a tip of the hat to JUnit 4.4, which has been soldiering on
> for a year now...
>
